  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:fnbe.profium.com:http://www.oph.fi/etalukio/historia/johdanto/index.html</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>fnbe</catalog>
            <entry>http://www.oph.fi/etalukio/historia/johdanto/index.html</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">What is history and what is it needed for?</string>
            <string language="fi">Mitä historia on ja mihin sitä tarvitaan?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Für was ist Geschichte und was wird sie 
benötigt?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Quelle est histoire et pour quoi est-elle 
nécessaire ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Que são history e que é necessitado para?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Che cosa è storia e che cosa è necessaria per?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τι είναι ιστορία και τι απαιτείται για;</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Cuál es historia y para qué se necesita?</string>
          </title>
          <language>fi</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Studies the nature of history as a science and subject of instruction as well as the key areas of the study of history. Includes instructions for students of history.</string>
            <string language="fi">Selittää historian luonnetta tieteenä ja oppiaineena sekä historian tutkimuksen keskeisiä kohteita. Sisältää ohjeistuksen historian opiskelijalle.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fi">historiatieteet</string>
            <string language="en">historiatieteet</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Studien die Natur der Geschichte als Wissenschaft und 
Unterrichtsfach sowie die Schlüsselbereiche der Studie der 
Geschichte. Schließt Anweisungen für Kursteilnehmer der 
Geschichte ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Études la nature de l'histoire comme science et sujet de 
l'instruction aussi bien que les zones principales de l'étude de 
l'histoire. Inclut des instructions pour des étudiants de 
l'histoire.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estudos a natureza do history como uma ciência e um 
assunto de instrução as.well.as as áreas chaves do estudo do 
history. Inclui instruções para estudantes do history.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi natura di storia come una scienza ed argomento di 
istruzione così come le zone chiave dello studio su storia. 
Include le istruzioni per gli allievi di storia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μελετά τη φύση της ιστορίας ως επιστήμη και θέμα της 
οδηγίας καθώς επίσης και τους βασικούς τομείς της μελέτης της 
ιστορίας. Περιλαμβάνει τις οδηγίες για τους σπουδαστές της 
ιστορίας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estudios la naturaleza de la historia como una ciencia y 
tema de la instrucción así como las áreas dominantes del estudio de
la historia. Incluye las instrucciones para los estudiantes de 
la historia.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">historiatieteet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">historiatieteet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">historiatieteet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">historiatieteet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">historiatieteet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">historiatieteet</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
